overview: The last weekend of the month for the people of Everest Boarding School is a time to re-unite with their families and have a good time. Ten year-old Hari is abandoned on the weekend, as he is unable to communicate with either of his parents, who are separated. This film shows the experiences of everyday life of students in similar circumstances, bound to an education system in which schoolchildren abide by the rules, at some cost to themselves.
title: A Paper Plane
